name: HTMLDialogElement.show
description: The show() method of the HTMLDialogElement interface displays the dialog modelessly, i.e. still allowing interaction with content outside of the dialog.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'show()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.

refs.name: HTML 5.1
refs.description: The definition of 'show()' in the 'HTML 5.1' specification.
